snippet: The bank is the latest on a list of firms and businesses to signal they were preparing for all possible outcomes as Greece’s financial and political situations deteriorate.
abstract: French bank Credit Agricole is the latest European financial firm to announce a contingency plan in case Greece exits the euro.
lead_paragraph: The bank is the latest on a list of firms and businesses to signal they were preparing for all possible outcomes as Greece’s financial and political situations deteriorate.

headline.main: Crédit Agricole Plans Contingency for Greek Exit
headline.print_headline: Finance: Crédit Agricole, Hurt by Greece, Posts a Loss
